cves.description: A vulnerability has been discovered in version 4.0.5 of appRain CMF, consisting of an authenticated reflected XSS due to a lack of proper validation of user input, through the 's' parameter in /apprain/developer/debug-log/db.
problemType: CWE-79 Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting')
